_comment: why use Json? because it is a standard format for data exchange between client(web applications) and server and also between server and server. those GET requests and POST requests are all using Json format to exchange data.
_store: myJson=; in console to see the data
name: jquery.iframe-transport.js
description: File Upload widget with multiple file selection, drag&drop support, progress bar, validation and preview images, audio and video for jQuery. Supports cross-domain, chunked and resumable file uploads and client-side image resizing. Works with any server-side platform (PHP, Python, Ruby on Rails, Java, Node.js, Go etc.) that supports standard HTML form file uploads.
